text: The 2000 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship ==Qualification== * Qualifying round: **May 6, 2000 ** Debrecen *Semi-Final A: **May 21, 2000 ** Glumso *Semi-Final B: **August 20, 2000 ** Heusden-Zolder ==Final== *August 27, 2000 * Ljubljana ==See also== 2000 Euro I J
title: 2000 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
